sn4.23:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn4.23:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma godhiko isigilipasse viharati kalasilayam.
sn4.23:1.4: Atha kho ayasma godhiko appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto samayikam cetovimuttim phusi.
sn4.23:1.5: Atha kho ayasma godhiko tamha samayikaya cetovimuttiya parihayi.
sn4.23:1.6: Dutiyampi kho ayasma godhiko appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto samayikam cetovimuttim phusi.
sn4.23:1.7: Dutiyampi kho ayasma godhiko tamha samayikaya cetovimuttiya parihayi.
sn4.23:1.8: Tatiyampi kho ayasma godhiko appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto samayikam cetovimuttim phusi.
sn4.23:1.9: Tatiyampi kho ayasma godhiko tamha …pe… parihayi.
sn4.23:1.10: Catutthampi kho ayasma godhiko appamatto …pe… vimuttim phusi.
sn4.23:1.11: Catutthampi kho ayasma godhiko tamha …pe… parihayi.
sn4.23:1.12: Pancamampi kho ayasma godhiko …pe… cetovimuttim phusi.
sn4.23:1.14: Chatthampi kho ayasma godhiko appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto samayikam cetovimuttim phusi.
sn4.23:1.15: Chatthampi kho ayasma godhiko tamha samayikaya cetovimuttiya parihayi.
sn4.23:1.16: Sattamampi kho ayasma godhiko appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto samayikam cetovimuttim phusi.
sn4.23:2.4: Atha kho maro papima ayasmato godhikassa cetasa cetoparivitakkamannaya yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam gathahi ajjhabhasi:
sn4.23:6.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasmata godhikena sattham aharitam hoti.
sn4.23:6.2: Atha kho bhagava “maro ayam papima” iti viditva maram papimantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn4.23:8.2: “ayama, bhikkhave, yena isigilipassam kalasila tenupasankamissama yattha godhikena kulaputtena sattham aharitan”ti.
sn4.23:8.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
sn4.23:9.1: Atha kho bhagava sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim yena isigilipassam kalasila tenupasankami.
sn4.23:9.2: Addasa kho bhagava ayasmantam godhikam duratova mancake vivattakkhandham semanam.
sn4.23:9.3: Tena kho pana samayena dhumayitattam timirayitattam gacchateva purimam disam, gacchati pacchimam disam, gacchati uttaram disam, gacchati dakkhinam disam, gacchati uddham, gacchati adho, gacchati anudisam.
sn4.23:10.2: “passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etam dhumayitattam timirayitattam gacchateva purimam disam, gacchati pacchimam disam, gacchati uttaram disam, gacchati dakkhinam disam, gacchati uddham, gacchati adho, gacchati anudisan”ti?
sn4.23:10.4: “Eso kho, bhikkhave, maro papima godhikassa kulaputtassa vinnanam samanvesati:
sn4.23:10.6: Appatitthitena ca, bhikkhave, vinnanena godhiko kulaputto parinibbuto”ti.
sn4.23:10.7: Atha kho maro papima beluvapanduvinam adaya yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
